team.title: Clinical Team
team.subtitle: Our team of specialist doctors is committed to offering the best care with excellence and dedication in the IAL standard

leonardo.bio: Dentist specializing in Radiology and Stomatology. Precise diagnosis and comprehensive view of oral health.

daiane.bio: Dentist specializing in Endodontics, focused on precision treatments and dental preservation.

carla.bio: Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeon with a Master's in Dental Medicine. Dedicated to aesthetic and functional smile rehabilitation.

marcos.bio: Over 17 years of clinical experience. Postgraduate in Dermatology (ISMD) and specialist in Hair Transplant.

aline.bio: Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeon trained in Advanced Facial Harmonization. Focused on natural and balanced results.

pethine.bio: Dentist specializing in Pediatric Dentistry. Humanized care focused on children's well-being and comfort.

sara.bio: Dentist working in integrated clinical dentistry and personalized approach for each patient.

yara.bio: Dentist working in General Dentistry and Oral Aesthetics. Focused on oral health combined with aesthetics, aiming for natural, functional, and personalized results for each patient.

patricia.bio: Plastic Surgeon recognized for excellence in breast surgeries, combining care, technique, and naturalness. Expertise in breast augmentation, reduction, and implant exchange, as well as HD Lipo with natural definition.

federica.bio: Focused on prevention, oral health maintenance, and personalized patient follow-up, with attention to comfort, technique, and continuous care.

arethuza.bio: Dentist specializing in Orthodontics, Orthopedics and Facial Harmonization. Master Injector Swift Beauty (NY) and Advanced Orofacial Harmonization (Miami).

treatments.title: Treatments
treatments.description:
Here, we treat smiles as an extension of each patient's identity.

We combine cutting-edge technology, multidisciplinary care, and aesthetic sensitivity to transform not just the smile — but also how you see and feel about yourself.

All with comfort, precision, and the excellence that makes Instituto Areluna a reference in oral rehabilitation.
treatments.discover_label: DISCOVER THE IDEAL TREATMENT FOR YOU

hero.description: Discover our complete range of dental treatments with cutting-edge technology, always prioritizing your comfort and the best results.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We Clarify Your Doubts
faq.description: We have gathered the most common questions about our treatments. Didn't find the answer you are looking for? Contact us.
faq.cta_desc: Our team is available to clarify all your questions in a personalized consultation.

ortho_time.question: How long does orthodontic treatment take?
ortho_time.answer: The time varies according to the complexity of the case, generally between 12 to 30 months. With invisible aligners, it can be faster (12-24 months). During the initial consultation, we provide a more precise estimate based on your specific situation.

implants_pain.question: Do dental implants hurt?
implants_pain.answer: The procedure is performed under local anesthesia, so you will not feel pain during surgery. Post-operatively, there may be some discomfort that is easily controlled with medication. Most patients resume normal activities in 2-3 days.

veneers_cost.question: How much do porcelain veneers cost?
veneers_cost.answer: The price of veneers varies according to the number of teeth and complexity of the case, starting from €600 per tooth. We offer flexible payment plans and a free initial consultation for a personalized quote.

whitening_safety.question: Is teeth whitening safe?
whitening_safety.answer: Yes, when performed by qualified professionals. We use approved techniques and pharmaceutical-grade products. There may be temporary sensitivity, which disappears in a few days. We always perform a prior assessment of dental health.

bone_graft.question: Do I need a bone graft to place implants?
bone_graft.answer: It depends on the quantity and quality of available bone. About 30% of patients need a graft. We use advanced bone regeneration techniques that significantly increase the possibilities of implant placement.

durability.question: What is the durability of aesthetic treatments?
durability.answer: Porcelain veneers last 15-20 years, whitening 2-3 years (depending on habits), implants can last a lifetime with proper care. We offer guarantees and preventive maintenance programs.

insurance.question: Do you accept health insurance?
insurance.answer: Yes, we work with the main Portuguese health insurances. We always check coverage before treatment and help with reimbursement procedures. Contact us to confirm your specific insurance.

simultaneous.question: Is it possible to do multiple treatments simultaneously?
simultaneous.answer: Yes, we often combine treatments to optimize results and reduce total time. For example, implants with whitening, or orthodontics followed by veneers. We create a personalized integrated treatment plan.

hero.description: Transform your smile while discovering the beauties of the city of Porto. A 3-day program with dental treatment and tourist experience included.

faq.title: Questions about the Program
faq.subtitle: Dental Tourism in Porto
faq.description: We clarify all doubts about our exclusive dental tourism program. A unique experience that combines excellent dental care with the charm of Porto.
faq.cta_desc: Schedule your dental tourism program and discover how you can transform your smile while exploring the beautiful city of Porto.

included.question: What is included in the 3-day program?
included.answer: The program includes initial consultation, personalized treatment plan, necessary dental treatments, guided tour of the city of Porto, suggested accommodation, and post-treatment follow-up. We also provide all tourist information to make the most of your stay.

language.question: Do I need to speak Portuguese to participate in the program?
language.answer: It is not necessary. Our team is fluent in several languages, including English, French, and Spanish. All service and communication can be done in your preferred language, ensuring total comfort throughout the process.

treatments.question: What types of treatments can be performed in 3 days?
treatments.answer: Treatments such as teeth whitening, porcelain veneers, crowns, small restorations, and deep cleanings can be completed. For more complex treatments like implants, we can start the process and plan a second visit if necessary.

accommodation.question: How is accommodation organized during the program?
accommodation.answer: We offer suggestions for partner hotels with special conditions for our patients, from budget options to luxury hotels. We can also recommend apartments or other types of accommodation according to your preference and budget.

tourism.question: What tourist sites will I visit in Porto?
tourism.answer: The itinerary includes iconic points such as Ribeira, Clérigos Tower, São Bento Station, Port wine cellars in Vila Nova de Gaia, Lello Bookstore, and much more. The tourist program is flexible and can be customized according to your interests.

prices.question: Are the prices different from normal service?
prices.answer: Treatment prices remain the same. The dental tourism program offers added value with the tourist experience, with no additional costs in treatments. You only pay for the dental treatments you need.

followup.question: What if I need additional treatment after returning to my country?
followup.answer: We maintain contact for post-treatment follow-up and can coordinate with dentists in your home country if necessary. We also offer online follow-up consultations, and if you need, you can always return for complementary treatments.

companion.question: Can I bring a companion during the program?
companion.answer: Of course! Companions are welcome and can participate in the tourist experience. We offer suggestions for activities so they can enjoy their time while you are in treatments. The tourist program can be adapted for groups.

hero.description: Regain your confidence with the most advanced hair transplant technique. Natural and long-lasting results with cutting-edge technology and specialized teams.

faq.title: Questions about Transplant
faq.subtitle: FUE Hair Transplant
faq.description: We clarify all doubts about FUE hair transplant. The most advanced technique to regain your confidence and natural hair density.
faq.cta_desc: Schedule a consultation to evaluate your case and define the best personalized hair transplant plan.

fue_technique.question: What is the FUE technique and how does it work?
fue_technique.answer: FUE (Follicular Unit Extraction) is the most advanced hair transplant technique. We extract individual follicles from the donor area with 0.8-1.0mm micro-punches, preserving surrounding tissues. Then we implant each follicle in the recipient area with precision, ensuring natural results and rapid healing.

pain.question: Is FUE hair transplant painful?
pain.answer: The procedure is performed under local anesthesia, so you will not feel pain during surgery. There may be some minimal discomfort in the first 2-3 days, easily controlled with medication. Most patients find the post-operative period much more comfortable than they expected.

results_time.question: When will I see the final results?
results_time.answer: The first hairs start to grow at 3-4 months. At 6 months a significant difference is already seen. The full final result is visible between 12-18 months. The transplanted hair grows normally and can be cut, styled, and treated like the rest of the hair.

sessions.question: How many sessions are necessary?
sessions.answer: In most cases, a single session is sufficient. Depending on the degree of baldness and aesthetic goals, a second session may be necessary after 12-18 months for greater density. During the consultation, we define a personalized plan for your specific case.

definitive.question: Is hair transplant permanent?
definitive.answer: Yes, hair transplant is permanent. The transplanted follicles are taken from the donor area (nape/sides) which genetically do not suffer from baldness. Therefore, the transplanted hair maintains these characteristics and will not fall out over a lifetime.

recovery.question: What is the recovery time?
recovery.answer: You can resume normal activities in 2-3 days. Work can be resumed after 3-5 days, depending on the activity. Intense physical exercise should be avoided for 2 weeks. The small scabs fall off naturally in 7-10 days. We follow strict post-operative monitoring.

donor_area.question: Can I have a transplant if I have little donor hair?
donor_area.answer: We evaluate each case individually. Even with limited donor area, it is often possible to achieve excellent results by focusing on the most important areas (front line). We use density maximization techniques and, if necessary, suggest complementary treatments.

natural_look.question: Does the result look natural?
natural_look.answer: Yes, with the FUE technique and our 25 years of experience, the results are completely natural. We respect the natural growth pattern, the direction of the hairs, and the front line appropriate to age. No one will be able to distinguish transplanted hair from natural hair.

hero.description: Enhance your natural beauty with the most advanced facial aesthetics treatments. Safe procedures and exceptional results with Dr. Arethuza Luna's team.

faq.title: Questions about Aesthetics
faq.subtitle: Premium Facial Aesthetics
faq.description: We clarify all doubts about our facial aesthetics treatments. Safe and personalized procedures to enhance your natural beauty.
faq.cta_desc: Schedule a consultation with Dr. Areluna's team of specialists to discover the best treatment protocol for you.

types.question: What types of facial aesthetics treatments do you offer?
types.answer: We offer a wide range of treatments including botox, hyaluronic acid fillers, chemical peels, facial mesotherapy, PDO threads for lifting, laser therapy, and rejuvenation treatments. Each procedure is personalized according to the specific needs of each patient.

pain.question: Are facial aesthetics treatments painful?
pain.answer: Most of our treatments cause only minimal discomfort. We use topical anesthesia techniques when necessary and always work to maximize patient comfort. Procedures like botox and fillers are generally well tolerated with only a slight stinging sensation.

results_time.question: When will I see the results of the treatments?
results_time.answer: Results vary by treatment. Botox shows effect in 3-7 days, fillers are immediate but the final result appears in 2 weeks, peels show improvement in 1-2 weeks. During the consultation, we explain the specific timeline for each procedure.

duration.question: How long do the results last?
duration.answer: Duration varies by treatment: botox lasts 4-6 months, fillers 6-18 months depending on the area, peels have progressive results, PDO threads maintain effect for 12-18 months. We establish a personalized maintenance plan to keep the results.

recovery.question: Is there any recovery time?
recovery.answer: Most treatments allow you to resume normal activities immediately. There may be slight swelling or redness that disappears in a few hours. For deeper peels, recovery time can be 3-7 days. We always provide detailed post-treatment instructions.

suitability.question: How do I know which treatment is right for me?
suitability.answer: During the free initial consultation, we evaluate your skin type, specific concerns, and aesthetic goals. Based on this personalized analysis, we recommend the most appropriate treatment protocol to achieve the desired results naturally and harmoniously.

safety.question: Are the treatments safe?
safety.answer: Yes, all our treatments are performed with certified products and proven techniques. Dr. Areluna has 25 years of experience and specialized training in facial aesthetics. We follow strict safety and hygiene protocols to ensure safe and effective procedures.

combination.question: Can I combine different treatments?
combination.answer: Yes, we often combine treatments for more complete and natural results. For example, botox with fillers, or mesotherapy with peels. We create personalized protocols that can include multiple procedures, always respecting safety intervals between treatments.
